title: Kobus Post
subtitle: Software Engineer & co-founder
body:
I am a (co-)founder and engineer with extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development. And a knack for entrepeneurial endeavors in the SaaS space. My sweet spot is working on technology that helps people improve how they work or live. Feel free to send me a message if you want to know more about me or want to collaborate.

I am currently working as a freelance software engineer.
